Title: Enacts the "reporting of arrests, detentions, actions and removals by immigration enforcement (RADAR) act"
Summary: Requires the creation of an immigration enforcement activity transparency dashboard, which shall be made publicly available, to track certain information relating to immigration authorities activities within New York state.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to enacting the "reporting of arrests, detentions, actions and removals by immigration enforcement (RADAR) act"
